overview: Hard X is back with their second volume of Hardcore Threesomes this stunning series celebrates the art of epic threesomes, featuring the most gorgeous girls in the industry. Starring: cover girls / bombshells, Kissa Sins and Kenna James, along with exotic beauty Carmen Caliente, the curvaceous cutie Lena Paul and many more. Hardcore Threesomes Vol. 2 is Directed by Mick Blue, this a release you won't want to miss!
title: Hardcore Threesomes 2
